TextView.android:text:
The Competition will be in two rounds : 
 
• Bug Finder (First Round) – In this round an app source will be given and its sample will 
 
be shown. There will be 20 bugs and marks will be given according to bugs found with 
 
negative points on wrong answers. Top 5 candidates will qualify to next level. 
 
• App Developer(Second Round) – In this round 3 hours’ time will be allotted to 
 
all competitors to develop anapp. The app will be given by the admin covering 5 
 
different type of topic. Internet will be available to all competitors in this round. 
 
• Most probable topics what competitors should prepare for are 
 
: *Different types of Activities, Intents and Bundles 
 
*ActionBar, Fragments,FragmentActivity and 
 
PagerAdapters *Medias and Camera 
 
*Animations, Widgets ,SurfaceView/View Classes 
 
*Different widgets, Basic system functions 
 
*Threads and Async Class
